pullrequest.title: Make sensors Visuals so they can have Visuals attached

content.raw:
Actually we designed the camera to be a leaf node so it’s consistent with the way it’s done in gazebo \(and also ogre\). To have a visual representation of a camera, the approach is to create a new parent visual node which the camera and it’s visual representation will be attached to. So for your use case, it would be something like:

            root
             |
           parent
            /  \
       camera   visual
                   |
                RTF Text
